fucking brilliant! thank you! oh my gawd! thank you!

I don't mind 128 bitrates, as a casual listener of music it really doesn't matter.

Smaller bitrates result in smaller d/l for people with lesser connections. I Cut them all down to 40 bitrate mp3pro to shave size anyway, and I honestly enjoy the music as much as well as stick 14000+ songs on my mp3 player.

Thanx for the torrent, been looking for a collection like this for a friend. I reallt appreciate everything everyone does for this site....
Thanks, good to get their early stuff.  Great band, even if Isaac Brock is an a**hole.
Me encanta esta banda, gracias por el torrent

now i know its hard to admit...we all had to at one point though...
